description: Temporary help services are required for the Department of National Defense (DND).
tags: Request For Proposal against Supply Arrangement
full_summary:
**Temporary Help Services Tender Announcement**
====================================================================

**Reference Number:** cb-5614-88138174

**Publication Date:** Thursday, May 18, 2023
**Closing Date:** Thursday, May 25, 2023 at 08:00:00

**Procurement Category:** Services
**UNSPSC Code:** 80111600 - Temporary personnel services
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective tendering

The Department of National Defense (DND) has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) on behalf of the Canadian Armed Forces for Temporary Help Services against the Supply Arrangement EN578-172870.

A Special Advisor (NATO Secret) is required to support the Canadian Armed Forces. The position is situated within the National Capital Region (NCR).

**Eligibility:**
The eligibility criteria for this RFP have been met by a select group of Supply Arrangement holders who have qualified under the following streams and categories: 13.9 Special Advisor.

**Invited Suppliers:**
The following Supply Arrangement holders have been invited to submit a proposal:

* ADGA Group Consultants Inc.
* ADRM Technology Consulting Group Corp.
* Altis Human Resources (Ottawa) Inc.
* Calian Ltd.
* Conoscenti Technologies Inc.
* Lionel Drouin
* Maplesoft Consulting Inc.
* MaxSys Staffing & Consulting Inc.
* Modis Canada Inc
* Quallium Corporation
* SoftSim Technologies Inc.
* Solutions LDC Inc.
* TRM Technologies Inc.
* Valcom Consulting group Inc.
* Veritaaq Technology House Inc.

**Tender Description:**
The DND requires Temporary Help Services to support its operations. The required services will be provided under a Request for Proposal (RFP) framework agreement.

**Security Requirements:**
The required security requirement for this position is NATO Secret.

**Contact Information:**
If you have any questions or concerns about this RFP, please contact the Contracting Authority at CFSG(O-G) Temp Help.

Telephone: 613-971-7955
Email: [CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca](mailto:CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca)

Note: We have not provided the attachment as we couldn't do that in markdown. Please see the provided pdf link.  [Attachment link](https://canadabu
